data.text: @goldstocktrades everything is up but jpg quality XD
@goldstocktrades Same here in Canada every day different price for the same grocery items,  I used to pay 19 $ for canola oil (16 liters) but now the cost is 45 $

@goldstocktrades @jimrockfordatSH this is a wake up call for europe and the west. the fastest way to cripple russia is to electrify our transportation system, and build small modular nuclear reactors.
@jimrockfordatSH Our support doesn’t help…we need to protect our own pipelines and borders.  Stop relying on Putin for metals and energy.
@goldstocktrades I think spending money to help the Ukraine is a noble endeavor.
